question: Show me the name and the filming location of the reality show filmed on Network A.
sql_query1: Select name, city FROM RealityShows WHERE network = "Network A";
sql_query2: Select name, country FROM RealityShows WHERE network = "Network A";
sql_query3: Select name, city, country FROM RealityShows WHERE network = "Network A";
interpretation1: Show the name of reality shows filmed by network A and the city where it was filmed.
interpretation2: Show the name of reality shows filmed by network A and the country where it was filmed.
interpretation3: Show the name of reality shows filmed by network A and the city and country where it was filmed.
sql_query_general: Select name, Filming_Location FROM RealityShows WHERE network = "Network A";

question: Show name and film location of reality shown where host was Host2
sql_query1: Select name, city FROM RealityShows WHERE host = "Host2";
sql_query2: Select name, country FROM RealityShows WHERE host = "Host2";
sql_query3: Select name, city, country FROM RealityShows WHERE host = "Host2";
interpretation1: What was the name of the reality show where the host was Host2, and in what city was it filmed?
interpretation2: What was the name of the reality show where the host was Host2, and in what country was it filmed?
interpretation3: What was the name of the reality show where the host was Host2, and in what city and country was it filmed?
sql_query_general: Select name, Filming_Location FROM RealityShows WHERE host = "Host2";
